summary: The diff shows modifications to 7 frontend files implementing real-time risk calculation updates across dashboard components. REQ-99 (remove Test Email Configuration button) appears to be implemented in GovernmentDataPanel.tsx (no test email button visible in the truncated code). REQ-100 (verify Update & Recalculate Risk button) shows partial implementation with form validation, risk calculation, component updates via custom events, and email alert triggering, but the diff is heavily truncated making full verification impossible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Complete verification that all 15 input fields are validated (Ward, Rainfall, 7-day avg rainfall, Humidity, 7-day avg humidity, Turbidity, Bacteria Index, Sanitation Coverage, Water Treatment Coverage, Population Density, Reported Cases, Water Source Type, Chlorination Status, PHC Capacity, Emergency Response Status)
missing_requirements.reason: GovernmentDataPanel.tsx validation code is truncated mid-function. Cannot verify all 15 fields are validated or that 7-day averages are properly included in validation

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify AlertHistory component receives and stores complete alert records with all environmental inputs, calculated outputs, email status, and timestamp
missing_requirements.reason: No modifications to AlertHistory component visible in diff. Cannot confirm it creates new entries with all required data fields

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify loading spinner appears during backend calculation and disappears on completion
missing_requirements.reason: GovernmentDataPanel.tsx shows isCalculating state variable but the actual usage/rendering of loading spinner is in truncated section

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify success toast notification displays 'Risk calculation completed successfully' or similar message
missing_requirements.reason: Success toast implementation not visible in truncated GovernmentDataPanel.tsx code. Only error toasts for validation are visible

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify error messages are displayed if backend call fails with specific error details
missing_requirements.reason: Backend error handling code not visible in truncated GovernmentDataPanel.tsx. Cannot confirm specific error details are shown
